alert.note: Alert for Cayuga; Seneca; Tompkins (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 5:30PM EDT until September 07 at 6:15PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Binghamton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Seneca County in central New York... Southern Cayuga County in central New York... North central Tompkins County in central New York... * Until 615 PM EDT. * At 530 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Interlaken, or 14 miles northeast of Dundee, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Auburn, Seneca Falls, Romulus, Fayette, Owasco, Fleming, Covert, Genoa, Ledyard, and Moravia. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
